Class Site

java.lang.Object
  Site

public class Site
extends Object

Compilation: javac Site.java simple data type for an (i, j) site added a hashcode -- since some graph implementations put these into HashMap/HashSet April 2011 Modified by J. Smith -- improved variable and method names! -- added toString
